_sText: This map is my first map over the past year. An obstacle map made for steamgamers minigames server. This is a beta. We will have testruns and suggestions are always welcome. ***### Changelog*** **####Beta4:** - Other bitrates didnt work for the music on the server, so I used 44100. **####Beta3:** - Added more traps - Fall damage is disabled - Added 3 music files wich randomly play - Added funnier ways to end the map, asswell a minigame - The 'father gregory' trap has been deleted. - Changed the timing for several traps - Added more level detail - Two minecarts are filled (easier to jump out) - Also you wont be stuck anymore when you try to jump into the white - The vault should give more fps now - Nodrawed the entire map - Added a 6min timer to end the map - I made the iceskating part bigger, easier to start - The endroom and minigame have a 30sec kill timer - and more .. **####Beta2:** - Changed the moving doors in the sewers to lasers. - Custom files should be visible now. (If i missed one, please say so) - Made some smooth changes to other traps. - Respawn time is now one minute - Players are now 30% transparent ingame. Screenshots to be updated..
